com.geolud.atomica.logic.pathfinding

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geolud.atomica.logic.pathfinding.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Node>

    public class Node
extends Object
implements Comparable<Node>
    Represents a node in the search graph. Holds a reference of a related Field in the GameSituation.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig

      Creates a new Node.
